---
title: "ScrapeAction"
description: "Base model for special actions that are always available and not related to the current page"
---



## Fields

<ParamField path="type" type="Literal['scrape']" required>
</ParamField>

<ParamField path="category" type="str" required>
</ParamField>

<ParamField path="description" type="str" required>
</ParamField>

<ParamField path="instructions" type="UnionType[str, None]" required>
</ParamField>

<ParamField path="only_main_content" type="bool" required>
  Whether to only scrape the main content of the page. If True, navbars, footers, etc. are excluded.
</ParamField>


## Module

`notte_core.actions`
